database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS - Paeruginosa PAO1 - PhzF2 metabolomics
entry.description:
LC-MS/MS data from: Impact of a Transposon Insertion in phzF2 on the Specialized Metabolite Production and Interkingdom Interactions of Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
Phelan VV, Moree WJ, Aguilar J, Cornett DS, Koumoutsi A, Noble SM, Pogliano K, Guerrero CA, Dorrestein PC.
J Bacteriol. 2014 May;196(9):1683-93. doi: 10.1128/JB.01258-13. Epub 2014 Feb 14.
PMID: 24532776

additional_fields.field: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 transposon mutant PhzF2
